title: Separate dining area, Full-size washer and dryer in home
map_address: 10851 W. Montfair Blvd near Woodlands Parkway
posting_body: Exceptional schools and green walking trails make The Woodlands Houston's premier suburb.
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1259 Sq.
- Sliding glass door to private patio/balcony
- Decorative crown molding and ceiling fans in bedroom and living space
- Oval garden soaking tubs and separate walk-in showers*
- Full-size washer and dryer in home
- Business center with Wi-Fi and printing
- Located in the master planned community of the Woodlands
- 55 inch HD entertainment center with Wi-Fi Seating
- Two trellised Texan barbecue areas with gas grills
- Located in the exceptional Conroe Independent School District
- Pet friendly with dog park (breed restrictions apply)
- Sparkling resort-style pool with walk-in beach entry
- Clubhouse kitchen with extensive counter space and oven
- Spacious clubhouse with billiards and shuffleboard
We welcome you & your best friend, too!
Please visit our website for additional details.
While we are open for self-guided, virtual and in-person tours, they are by appointment only.
Please call us or schedule a tour on our website to visit the property in person.
10851 W. Montfair Blvd, The Woodlands, TX, 77382
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
